mapper.select: SELECT faq_no as faqNo, category as category, title as title, content as content, user_id as userId, regdate as regdate, end_yn as endYN FROM faq
SELECT notice_No as noticeNo, title as title, content as content, regdate as regdate, user_name as username FROM notice n left join member m on(n.user_id=m.user_id) ORDER BY notice_NO DESC
